title: Illuminating the Darkness
description: Every good deed comes with a price.Why is it so hard to just live a good life?For Rhia, staying focused on mastering her gift and becoming a demon warrior, is paramount. However, first, she must escape the attention of her rescuer.James, a Balance Keeper sworn to protect humanity from the rising demonic darkness, can barely keep his eyes off of Rhia, complicating everything as the spark between them grows stronger. After an explosive battle, their team nearly doesn't succeed, and several are injured forcing James to work closely with Rhia to protect and further the presence and territory of the balance.When the battle lines blur and the innocent children are the target, passions rise and individual needs should be forgone.But even knowing failure's cost is the end of the world, these warriors fight to focus on the call and ignore self as they stand in the gap. If they fail, the end of everything is nigh. With the spiritual war escalating will they fulfill their calling before all Hell breaks loose?***If you love apocalyptic battles, angelic epics, and fearsome warriors, then youâ€™ll love the Balance Keeper Series.
author: J.L. Burrows
